agenda.business

类 User

  • java.lang.Object
    • agenda.business.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent a user in this system. This class store any information about a user, for example, user's name and user's password.

    • 构造器概要

        参数:

    • 方法详细资料

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Getter of user name.
        返回:
        user name of this user

      • getPassword

        public java.lang.String getPassword()
        Getter of user's password.
        返回:
        user's password of this user

      • setPassword

        public void setPassword(java.lang.String newPassword)
        Setter of user's password.
        参数:
        newPassword - new password

      • addMeeting

        public void addMeeting(Meeting pMeeting)
        Add a meeting to user's meeting list
        参数:
        pMeeting - the meeting to be added

      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(java.lang.String pPassword)
        Check password.
        参数:
        pPassword - to be check whether it match with user's password
        返回:
        true if the password is correct

      • getMeetingsByDate

        public java.util.ArrayList<Meeting> getMeetingsByDate(Date begin,
                                                      Date end)
        Get meetings by date
        参数:
        begin - begin date
        end - end date
        返回:
        all meetings that overlap with [begin, end]

      • getMeetingByTitle

        public Meeting getMeetingByTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Get meeting by title.
        参数:
        title - the title of the meeting
        返回:
        null if the meeting doesn't exist

      • deleteMeetingByTitle

        public boolean deleteMeetingByTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Remove a meeting by title.
        参数:
        title - the title of the meeting to be deleted
        返回:
        false if the meeting doesn't exist

      • deleteMeeting

        public boolean deleteMeeting(Meeting meeting)
        Remove a meeting.
        参数:
        meeting - the meeting to be removed
        返回:
        false if the user doesn't have the meeting

      • clearAllMeetings

        public void clearAllMeetings()
        Clear all meetings. This function also affects the other participators of all meetings.

      • isBusy

        public boolean isBusy(Date bDate,
                      Date eDate)
        Judge whether this user is busy during the given time.
        参数:
        bDate - begin date
        eDate - end date
        返回:
        true if user is busy during the given time
